TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PartialCachingControl extends System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl

summary.span: 當使用者控制項 (.ascx 檔案) 針對輸出快取指定時使用頁面指示詞時或 屬性建立，並且以 方法動態載入使用者控制項，將使用者控制項插入至頁面的控制項階層架構。

span.span: Created when a user control (.ascx file) is specified for output caching, using either the page directive or the attribute, and the user control is inserted into a page's control hierarchy by dynamically loading the user control with the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法使用頁面和控制項的開發人員直接類別。Page and control developers cannot use the class directly. ASP.NET 建立的執行個體類別來為使用者控制項 （.ascx 檔案） 時以動態方式載入的使用者控制項可讓輸出快取。ASP.NET creates an instance of the class to wrap a user control (.ascx file) when a dynamically loaded user control enables output caching. 您可以啟用輸出快取使用的使用者控制項[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)頁面指示詞或屬性。You can enable output caching for a user control using either the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) page directive or the attribute. 您將使用者控制項加入頁面以程式設計方式透過呼叫方法。You add a user control to a page programmatically by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CachedControl As Control
public: property System::Web::UI::Control ^ CachedControl { System::Web::UI::Control ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得對快取使用者控制項的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the user control that is cached.
The user control that is cached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在其輸出不會快取時，這個屬性會傳回使用者控制項。This property returns the user control only when its output is not cached. 如果使用者控制項輸出會在輸出快取中存在，則這個屬性會傳回`null`，因為永遠不會建立控制項的執行個體。If the user control output exists in the output cache, this property returns `null`, because an instance of the control is never created.
